Three Column Contents, Speaker

 

Last, First Name


Director, Head of US Offshore and Latin America Distribution


Tel: 1 212 632 1325 | eduardo.mora@lazard.com


Rising US interest rates--and soaring Treasury yields--have done their part to rattle global economics. As the environment settles, we expect growth differentials to shift, creating a more positive backdrop for emerging markets debt and interesting investment opportunities for the asset class across the capital structure.
